articles.description: Rakhi Sawant has grabbed headlines with her wedding with Adil Durrani. But before that, she had not some good tryst with love.
articles.content: Rakhi recently revealed she's married to Adil Durrani. The wedding had happened on May 29, 2022 but the two kept it a secret.
